text: Carel Nicolaas Visser (May 3, 1928 - March 1, 2015) was a Dutch sculptor. Visser was born in 1928 in Papendrecht, South Holland. He was known for turning useless pieces of metal and concrete into statues. Visser died in Le Fousseret, France, aged 86.Carel Visser: Sculptor hailed as a master of minimalism who turned metal and concrete into elegant and powerful forms ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch artists Category:People from South Holland
title: Carel Visser
